Hubungan Zinedine Zidane dan Gareth Bale Tidak Seburuk yang Diberitakan
06 Nov 2019, 13:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Zinedine Zidane mencoba membantah pandangan negatif tentang hubungannya dengan penyerang terbaik Real Madrid, Gareth Bale. Zidane mengaku menjalin hubungan profesional yang positif dengan Bale.
Sejak akhir musim lalu, media terus mengadu Zidane dengan Bale. Zidane dituding tidak menyukai Bale, yang dilihat dari absennya penyerang Wales itu pada beberapa pertandingan penting.
Hubungan ini Zidane-Bale dikabarkan kian memburuk pada bursa transfer musim panas lalu. Zidane tampak mengusir Bale secara perlahan, kabar transfer ke Cina sempat menguat meski akhirnya batal terjadi.
Intinya, hampir tidak pernah ada kabar baik tentang hubungan Zidane-Bale, selalu buruk. Namun, kini Zidane membantah anggapan tersebut.

The relationship between Zinedine Zidane and Gareth Bale is not as bad as reported
Nov 6 2019, 13:30 by Bola.net
Soccer - Zinedine Zidane tries to refute negative views about his relationship with Real Madrid's best striker, Gareth Bale. Zidane claimed to have a positive professional relationship with Bale.
Since the end of last season, the media has been pitting Zidane with Bale. Zidane was accused of not liking Bale, as seen from the absence of the Wales striker in several important matches.
This relationship Zidane-Bale reportedly got worse in the transfer market last summer. Zidane seemed to evict Bale slowly, news of the transfer to China had strengthened even though it finally canceled.
In essence, there is almost never good news about Zidane-Bale's relationship, it's always bad. However, now Zidane refutes these assumptions.
